Sentencas: Y2O3 stabilized zirconia (YSZ) is frequently used as an electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Fabrication and electrical characterization of several YSZ tapes for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Tape-casting is a readily available and easy-to-use option for obtaining thin, ceramic films with high relative density.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrical characterization of several YSZ tapes for SOFC applications

Sentencas: In order to obtain fluid slips, rheological studies of aqueous suspensions of three different commercial YSZ powders dispersed with a polyacrylic acid-based dispersant agent have been performed.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrical characterization of several YSZ tapes for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Their viscosity was optimized by controlling the dispersant concentration, pH and homogenization time using an ultrasound probe.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrical characterization of several YSZ tapes for SOFC applications

Sentencas: An electrical study of the sintered tapes prepared under strict control of the rheology was done by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrical characterization of several YSZ tapes for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Their conductivity is compared to that obtained for non-optimized tapes, showing not big differences after the colloidal processing.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrical characterization of several YSZ tapes for SOFC applications
